name: Rat Chef (itch) (mkmason)
description: YOU are un petit raton (a little rat) living in the sewers of Paris, one of the finest culinary cities in the world. You dream of preparing fine cuisine, but your being a rodent stands in your way. One day, the entire kitchen at one of the most famous restaurants in Paris catches ill. The owner, sympathetic of your plight and knowledgeable of your skills, invites you in to prepare a prix-fixe meal for the entire restaurant. It’s also the same day of the health inspection. Can you prepare a fine, multi-course meal, without the health inspector catching onto your ruse?
